ignoreCertErrors.signpost: Checking this will automatically import the necessary SSL certificates from LCM and Identity Manager.

identityManagerHost.label: Identity Manager Host
identityManagerHost.description: Identity Manager Host for OAUTH2.0 logins
identityManagerHost.signpost: The FQDN of the Identity Manager host. If unsure, this would be in the 'globalenvironment' LCM environment.

identityManagerClientId.label: OAUTH Client ID
identityManagerClientId.description: The Client ID to use when contacting Identity Manager
identityManagerClientId.signpost: The OAUTH2 Client ID from Identity Manager, which must have a 'password' grant enabled on it.

identityManagerClientSecret.label: OAUTH Client Secret
identityManagerClientSecret.description: The Client Secret to use when contacted IdentityManager
identityManagerClientSecret.signpost: The OAUTH2 Client Secret from Identity Manager. This secret must be created using the API, see above link.

identityManagerUser.label: Directory User
identityManagerUser.signpost: The AD or LDAP Service Account to use for API connections.

userDomain.label: Directory Domain
userDomain.signpost: The FQDN of the Active Directory domain the user belongs to.

identityManagerUserPassword.label: Directory User Password
identityManagerUserPassword.signpost: Password of the AD/LDAP Account to use.
